settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Great Grains Blend (Brown Rice Bran Powder, Organic Flex Powder, Barley Malt Powder), Herbal Blend (Organic Alfalfa Powder, Parsley Powder, Bee Pollen Powder, Siberian Ginseng Powder, Aloe Vera Powder, Astragalus Powder, Bilberry Powder, Ginger Powder, Gingko Biloba Powder, Green Tea Powder, Licorice Powder, Milk Thistle Powder, Peppermint Powder, Royal Jelly Powder, Schisandra Powder, Stevia Extract Powder), Sea Vegetable Powder (Spirulina Powder, Chlorella Powder, Sea Whistle Powder), Fruit Blend (Apple Pectin Powder, Pineapple Powder, Grape Skin Extract, Acerola Juice Powder), Green Grass Blend (Organic Barley Grass Powder, Organic Kamut Grass Powder, Organic Oat Grass Powder, Organic Rye Grass Powder, Organic Wheat Grass Powder), Vegetable Blend (Beet Juice Powder, Broccoli Powder, Rhubarb Juice Powder, Spinach Powder), Fructooligosaccharides (FOS), silica.

settings.heading: Directions
settings.content: Adults mix two (2) teaspoons into 8 oz. of apple juice or other favorite liquid, or use as directed by a health care professional. Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct light. Great with apple juice.

settings.heading: Warning
settings.content:
Consult your physician before using this product if you are pregnant or nursing, taking medications, or have a medical condition. Discontinue use two weeks before surgery.

Warning:Â Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if the safety seal is damaged or missing. Store in a cool, dry place.

settings.title: Benefits of Ultra Cleanse Smoothie Greens
Feeling energized
settings.text: I started using this powder and my energy levels have skyrocketed. I feel more awake and active throughout the day. Love mixing it with smoothies or my morning juice.
settings.author: Jessica M.

settings.title: Great for digestion
settings.text: This supplement has really improved my digestion. I feel less bloated and more regular since I started using it. Definitely a great detox powder.
settings.author: Shaniqua C.

settings.title: Love the taste
settings.text: I was a little worried when I ordered that the powder will taste bad, but I actually love the taste. I mix this with apple juice in the mornings and feel much lighter throughout the day. It's an easy and delicious way to get my daily nutrients.
settings.author: Emily P.

settings.title: Significant improvement in my overall health
settings.text: I've noticed a significant improvement in my overall health since taking this. My skin looks better, and I feel more balanced and healthy. I would reccomend.
settings.author: Patricija R.

settings.title: So far so good
settings.text: What a great way to improve your daily nutrition. The taste is not bad at all, much better than expected (compared to some other powders I tried before)... Been using this for 2 weeks and so far so good.
settings.author: Mackenzie W.

settings.heading: What's the shipping cost?
settings.row_content: On average all order shipping costs are 4.5$ to any state in the US. International shipping costs may vary.

settings.heading: When will I receive my products?
settings.row_content:
All products are shipped out from our fulfilment center within 4-6 business days and on average it takes 1-5 business days to deliver your order. If things go smoothly, you place your order on Monday you should receive it by Friday the same week.

Every now and then, such as holiday seasons, there may be a delay on orders due to the high volume coming in within such a short time period. We value being transparent with our customers, so please be patient as we are a small team doing the best we can! Thanks for your understanding.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: In case you receive a product that has been damaged during shipment we will automatically ship out new product for you or issue a full refund. Refer to refund policy on footer of page.Â If you cancel a non subscription before the order is confirmedÂ to ship you will be issued a full refund. Subscription items can be referred to in subscription policy in footer.

settings.heading: Where are the products manufactured?
settings.row_content: This product is produced under strict quality control standards, ensuring you receive a premium product every time.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once you will make a purchase and your order will be confirmed, we will send out an order tracking link.

settings.text: We have a no-questions-asked returns policy. Just drop us a line within 30 days and consider it done.
